items.title: Grant funding disruptions affect one in 30 clinical trials
items.description: Grant funding disruptions affected about one in 30 trials, according to a research letter published online Nov. 17 in JAMA Internal Medicine.

items.title: A simple neck scan could detect men at high risk of heart failure
items.description: A simple neck scan can identify men with double the risk of heart failure, according to research led by University College London.
